videos.alt_text: Sabrina Carpenter Ft. Jenna Ortega - Taste
videos.title: Sabrina Carpenter Ft. Jenna Ortega - Taste (2024)
videos.description: In Sabrina Carpenter's music video for "Taste," co-starring Jenna Ortega, the duo engage in a gory, darkly comedic rivalry over a two-timing boyfriend. Directed by Dave Meyers, the video features numerous campy horror and cult film references, including scenes inspired by Death Becomes Her and Kill Bill. Carpenter and Ortega repeatedly murder each other in elaborate ways, including stabbings, voodoo dolls, and falls from great heights, only to make up with a kiss. In collaboration with Jacobi Mehringer, Anna Arnell, and Lizzy Walker.

videos.title: Jhula - Manish Khushalani (2024)
videos.description: The music video for "Jhula" by Manish Khushalani, released in 2024, explores themes of vulnerability, trust, and the delicate nature of relationships. The video combines Indian classical elements with contemporary electronic music, creating a unique visual and auditory experience. The narrative is driven by a series of intimate and evocative scenes that reflect the song's emotional depth, showcasing a blend of traditional and modern aesthetics that highlight the fusion of cultural influences.
